dublinCore.dc:title: 113 S2546 IS: Auto Enroll Repeal Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Isakson introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

form.official-title: To repeal a requirement that new employees of certain employers be automatically enrolled in the employerâ€™s health benefits plan.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Auto Enroll Repeal Act.
Section 18A of the Fair Labor Standards Act (29 U.S.C. 218a), as added by section 1511 of the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act, is repealed.
